title: Give us the report button in Match History.
body:
Last _**ranked**_ game was a 2v5. Mid left, Top inted, bot RQ.
And then I couldn't report them because of course the lobby failed to load.
Am I supposed to submit _three_ tickets?
And HOW are people getting all the way to Gold with an attitude that they can just quit whenever they personally aren't winning their lane? Surely they must have been reported one or ten times by now. How are they not getting banned?

replies.body:
Hate to break it to ya...

This also happens in plat.

This also happens in diamond.

(havent gotten further than that so i cant tell you if it happens there, but assume it does.)

The community is toxic, and bad words get banned while afking/trolling does not if they do it without saying they are doing it on purpose.
This should be a thing

You can report multiple people in one ticket.... just saying.

But yeah i agree. Add that rito!
AFKing and leaving games is handled by Leaverbuster. And the penalties for leaving games are fairly harsh.

That's probably exactly it.
But they shouldn't be.
There's losing connection, which is handled perfectly appropriately by the automated systems.
And then there's losing your lane and Ragequitting.
IMO Ragequitting should be punished far more harshly than losing connection.
at this point I leave games all the time and I can tell you that I've never been punished by leaverbuster.

> [{quoted}](name=FkValeRly,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ulE5nMKW,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-04-27T11:35:22.274+0000)
>
> at this point I leave games all the time and I can tell you that I've never been punished by leaverbuster.

Definitely calling bullshit on that one. I know from experience if you AFK more than twice in 20 games you're looking at a 20 minute penalty before you play again for 5 games.
eh I don't know how much I'm exactly leaving but whenever I don't feel like its a good game I just leave and nothing ever happens.

Agreed

Half of my matches the End of Game screen doesn't load
"rito this dudes afk'd my one game! ban them instantly plox! what? they only did it for that one game? I don't care! it's my game that got ruined! ban instantly plox!"

Yeah, right.
Like someone who thinks it's acceptable to leave a match would only do it once.

> [{quoted}](name=Metal Janna,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ulE5nMKW,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-04-26T09:43:58.001+0000)
>
> Yeah, right.
> Like someone who thinks it's acceptable to leave a match would only do it once.

IMO it depends on why they disconnect, if my power went out or my internet connection suddenly went out, than leaver buster is enough, but if I for instance constantly saya stuff like if you ks I afk, and just disconnect clearly because Im trying to hinder my team/ Im toxic, then another form of penalty should take place aka ban.
https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/009/570/e0d.jpg
What would be different? They wont get punished

From experience so far, their instant feedback system replies to verbal offenses super quick, but that's about it. I know that apparently back during Tribunal times, whenever a perma-ban was about to be issues, a Rioter was going to look over it. Dunno how it is today. I've reached the point where I rather submit Tickets than trust the instant feedback system. It's cool and all that you wanna keep it discrete and not even tell me if the system has taken any effect, but it's bound to fail. What can that thing do to check if someone has decided to just walk in circles or purposely leave their lane for good than just checking for some chat message saying "I'm AFK". What if it is just a joke? The IFS is BOUND to be unreliable. So yeah, write tickets, don't issue reports. According to Riots Support EVERY report is evaluated by the system, it doesn't matter how many they are. 

It's the same reason why it always only gives u a chat log if any punishment is issued against you. Unless someone recorded a video and submitted a ticket there is simply NO evidence against you. This is not me encouraging to troll without using words, what I'm saying is, record every game, or save the replays and attach them to your tickets. 

Also stop the discrete bs about whether you took actions pls @Riot. Not because I wanna bath in self-praise over me reporting someone but because I wanna know if you actually do something about toxicity like you claim to.

I've reported 2 AFKs that have been AFK for over 15 minutes, deliberately, so as in, it seemed like they didnt do it the first time (Leaverbuster did not detect them, which is something you'd normally see in the endgame screen) and after checking their Match History they were able to continue playing just fine, DESPITE me directly reporting them to the support.

The "I agree" text when leaverbuster detects you left a game should be for those who fucked up and had their wifi disconnected or couldn't connect back into the game, these players announced that they would go AFK and **NOTHING** happened to them.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

>And HOW are people getting all the way to Gold with an attitude that they can just quit whenever they personally aren't winning their lane? Surely they must have been reported one or ten times by now. How are they not getting banned?

I can get to dia like this and not get banned :^) 

its just better to afk / int the lanes of people that are annoying you than say bad words to them so I can see why people do it.

Match history and recent players. I've had a few rare instances where my client either froze and crashed, or it skips stats automatically and I miss the chance of reporting a highly toxic, offensive player. :\

I agree! There should be one in the client for general purpose. Ex. Someone picks zed support intentionally (no pick planning in place other than trolling) and you decide to dodge. How does he get penalized for trolling? Only one getting the slap is yourself.
that is riot games logic for u, instaban 14 days for some words but leave trolling alone
Yes I think its a good idea.. or even an in game ban.. possibly a good idea to try.

Ya know it's funny.. in the most blatantly obvious griefer or toxic games.. the ones where players say extremely hateful instant perma ban words, or blatant "im going to int the fuck out of you now" phrases where they have no hope of not getting banned, but somehow don't expect it to happen..

those are the ONLY games I get no lobby loading, and it somehow happens EVERY FUCKING TIME. how is this even possible? it's so far beyond possible coincidence now it's not even funny

> How are they not getting banned?

Because this game is trash
